column4: ok, so in compiz, I enabled all the dekstop cube stuff, but I can

ok, so in compiz, I enabled all the dekstop cube stuff, but I can't figure out how to make it zoom out to the skydome so  I can rotate the cube! Instead I can only seem to flip it around,  without actually seeing the cube. Does anyone know the command?
CTRL+ALT+click+drag -- but compiz stuff should perhaps go to #compiz
